theGamblignant:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

theGamblignant:LuckPower.NAME: Luck
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase all your dice rolls by #b, without exceeding their normal limits.

theGamblignant:LoseLuckPower.NAME: Luck Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b Luck.
